divs: Sighting DetailsLeaving my mother's residential area, overcast and clouds were low. I was driving and my daughter and I saw this UFO just dropped from the clouds and it was an organge tear dropped shape and seemed to be separated in the middle. It looked like the outter edges had flames or spikes coming out. It was coming in our direction and was right over us, about 500 feet above us. It was heading in a NW direction, but more west, coming directly towards us than it stopped. It started going strait west and went for probably a thousand feet and then stopped and then it went directely verticle into the clouds.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
Summary: Orange, two sectioned tear-drop shaped, tiny sun rays coming off
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were 2 other sightings in Phoenix on or around July 28th 2012
